summary: THE HYDRAULIC PUMP WAS INOPERATIVE. WHILE BACKING THE VEHICLE OUT OF DRIVEWAY, THE  HYDRAULIC PUMP FAILED TO WORK.  MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED, AND STATED THEY WOULD LOOK AT IT. BUT CONSUMER HAD NOT HEARD ANYTHING ABOUT IT.  *AK  THE HYDRAULIC PUMP SHAFT SEVERED WHILE THE CONSUMER WAS DRIVING.  THE VEHICLE HAD BECOME IMPOSSIBLE TO STEER .  THE MECHANIC STATED THIS WASN'T THE FIRST INCIDENT WITH THIS MAKE/MODEL.  *SCC  *JB
